questionText: Crash tests are beginning in China.
author: A3GWRDHAURRNK6

questionText: Side airbags are being installed ton prevent injuries in side collisions or rollovers.
author: A3GWRDHAURRNK6

questionText: Improperly installed child seats have been responsible for children injuries.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Some auto dealers are offering free assistance in the proper installation of children's seats.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Some Automakers initially resisted the introduction of safety features.
author: ACAJFF4MF5S5X

questionText: Although there are weaknesses, when it comes to vehicular safety the safety belt was a critical invention.
author: A1DCKRRPA4AWVD

questionText: Many automakers claimed that airbags were unwanted by consumers.
author: A3TS2NCBAB9L6V

questionText: Some bags inflating in low speed crashes have been blamed for killing several people.
author: A2IXBTOWQRCLPZ

questionText: All wheel drive became available from Subaro, Volvo, and Mercedes.
author: ACAJFF4MF5S5X
